title: Rosemary Chicken Couscous Salad
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped fresh rosemary leaves
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 large cooked skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces
½ cup chopped pitted kalamata olives
⅓ cup chopped fresh Italian parsley
salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Place chicken stock in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Stir in couscous, remove from heat, cover, and let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff couscous and cool for 10 minutes. For the dressing, blend olive oil, lemon juice, and vinegar until thick, then stir in rosemary. Combine chicken, cucumber, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives in a bowl. Add couscous, feta, and parsley; season with salt and pepper. Toss with half the dressing and adjust as needed before serving.
